# looker_folder (Data Source)

## Example Usage
```terraform
data "looker_folder" "folder" {
  id = "123"
}
```
## Example Output
```terraform
% terraform show
# data.looker_folder.folder:
data "looker_folder" "folder" {
  id   = "123"
  name = "USA"
}
```
<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) Search folder based on id.
- `name` (String) Search folder based on name.

### Read-Only

- `parent_id` (String) Id of the parent folder.
